AR 4. ESRS 2 SBM-2 requires the undertaking to provide an understanding of whether and how it
considers the role that its strategy and business model may play in creating, exacerbating or
mitigating significant material impacts on its own workforce, and whether and how the
business model and strategy are adapted to address such material impacts.
